__e: Are you now so politically correct that I can't make a joke?
Well, that leaves only me in favor of calling a spade a spade.
I mean, he wasn't asking that much, but now that he's dead, well, might as well call a spade a spade.
I seem to have one too many shovels.
If they want to call it something else, so be it. But let's... call things by their names, what happened to this kid is truly a fucking disgrace.
I mean, he wasn't asking that much, but now that he's dead, well, might as well call a spade a spade.
